about_the_game:
Inside us is a cooperative survival horror game for up to 4 players.

Are you brave enough to plunge into the world of nightmares and face your greatest fears? Gather your friends and find the courage to extract as much Nightmare Essence as possible during this terrifying escape




During the dream, you will travel through the scariest corners of nightmares and the darkness that can poison your mind in the blink of an eye. Fortunately, you do not go on this journey alone, you have your trusted crew with you! Together you will overcome all the tasks and obstacles waiting for you ... right?

During each dream, there is a chance that one of you will have a different goal… that doesn't quite match the goals of the team. Are you the one to get rid of sentiment and become a double agent? Or maybe your intentions are sincere and together with your team you’ll try to eliminate the agent and end this mad game?



  • Online cooperation for 1 to 4 players.
  • Communicate with the team over the radio.
  • Explore the darkness by completing various tasks in sync with your team.
  • Avoid scary creatures.
  • Collect Nightmare Essence and develop your research facility to discover unique storyline.
  • Play as an agent and make the task difficult for other players or try to discover the agent's identity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Procesor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
